entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #56955
  • 8.0 Templates.Mvc.Tests consistently timing out on Debian machines #56953
  • Random NullReferenceException at several Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest properties #56951
  • Blazor ErrorBoundary error content not shown when exception occurs inside @foreach #56950
    Backlog
  • Blazor SSR page - start downloading WASM in background #56944
  • Attach HttpRequestMessage to Polly Context in PolicyHttpMessageHandler for access by policy callbacks #56943
  • Perf regression: json #56942
  • Blazor form submit clicking enter needs to be pressed twice and when input focus it does not work at first time #56940

Closed

  • Update PackageOverrides.txt for latest packages #56724
    9.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] [Documentation] Example project referenced in the documentation doesn't work #56779
  • Enum route binding are case sensitive #56952
  • System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload skips Data from Payload #56948
  • `System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute.` from `AuthenticationStateProvider.NotifyAuthenticationStateChanged` #56891

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-preview7] Fix setting BuildNodeJs #56958
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Parameters sourced from query, header, and route are never nullable #56957
    area-web-frameworks
  • Remove PackageOverrides & PlatformManifest files from main #56956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix setting BuildNodeJs #56954
    area-infrastructure
  • HybridCache: reflect API merge into runtime - preview 7 backport #56946
    area-infrastructure, feature-caching
  • HybridCache: reflect API merge into runtime #56945
    feature-caching, area-networking
  • Quarantine ConfigureEndpointDevelopmentCertificateGetsLoadedWhenPresent #56939
    area-networking
  • Make metrics abort test more resilient #56938
    area-networking

Merged

  • Make ApiExplorer for minimal APIs trim-compatible #56827
    feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc1
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Make ApiExplorer for minimal APIs trim-compatible #56937
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 4 #56895
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Update branding to RC1 #56936
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Quarantine `RazorPages_CanBeServedAndUpdatedViaRuntimeCompilation` #56935
    area-mvc
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b4aaf97` to `9ff2450` #56894
    area-infrastructure
